comment.text: The BackupProgress translation key is used to display the current backup progress percentage. It will be displayed as a value in a UI element, likely a status message or a progress bar, indicating how much of the backup process has been completed. This appears to be part of a backup interface, possibly on a settings page or a restore dialog.

usage.context:
buttonSize,
 setTenantStatus,
 isFormReady,
 getStorageParams,
 uploadLocalFile,
 isBackupProgressVisible,

 backupPrgressError,
 } = props;

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Պահուստային պատճեն՝ {{progress}}%' is a literal translation of "Backup". A more natural and idiomatic Armenian translation for "Backup" in a settings context would be something like "Մեխանիկական պատճենագրություն" or "Պատճենահամակարգ".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "Մեխանիկական պատճենագրություն՝ {{progress}}%" or "Պատճենահամակարգ՝ {{progress}}%" for a more natural feel.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Dutch translation uses a hyphenated 'Back-up' instead of 'Back-up'. While both are sometimes used, 'Back-up' is generally preferred.

The translation "Faça cópias de segurança: {{progress}}%" is a literal translation of 'Make backups'. A more natural and idiomatic translation would be 'Backup em andamento: {{progress}}%' or 'Backup: {{progress}}%' as it aligns better with common Portuguese usage for backup progress notifications.
The curly braces around 'progress' are not consistent with the English version. English uses '{{progress}}' while Turkish uses '%{{progress}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change '%{{progress}}' to '{{progress}}' to match the English format.
